item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Cheating alleged after men's world conker champion found with steel chestnut (135 points | 163 comments)
2. Superstitious Users and the FreeBSD Logo (26 points | 5 comments)
3. Busy Status Bar (1022 points | 334 comments)

7. Commonly used arm positions can overestimate blood pressure readings: study (221 points | 159 comments)
8. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (328 points | 104 comments)
9. Gosub – An open-source browser engine (239 points | 123 comments)
10. The three-page paper that shook philosophy: Gettiers in software engineering (159 points | 95 comments)
11. Splitting engineering teams into defense and offense (84 points | 56 comments)

14. Show HN: X11 tool to share a screen area in any video meeting (260 points | 121 comments)
15. Zamba2-7B (217 points | 43 comments)

18. Google commits to buying power generated by nuclear-energy startup Kairos Power (469 points | 291 comments)
19. Remains of an ancient Greek structure found in Croatia (79 points | 22 comments)
20. The web I want vs. the one we have (62 points | 67 comments)

22. PayloadCMS: Open-Source, Fullstack Next.js Framework (133 points | 40 comments)
23. Can a biologist fix a radio? What I learned while studying apoptosis (2002) [pdf] (47 points | 11 comments)
24. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format (165 points | 39 comments)
25. Automating the most annoying aspects of blogging (27 points | 10 comments)
26. Routine dental X-rays are not backed by evidence (137 points | 118 comments)
27. New images show state of preservation of Ernest Shackleton's ship (79 points | 26 comments)
28. The Wes Cook Archive (58 points | 8 comments)
29. Zapata AI Ceases Operations (32 points | 21 comments)
30. Deep learning-based detection of qanat water systems using spy satellite imagery (38 points | 5 comments)
